page.title: 02 LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Local police are worried by a lack of manpower.They have most complaints about vandalism caused by gangs of youths who terrorize some local residents.In order to bring them to court the police need witnesses and people fear reprisals,several people have been injured by these gangs. The crime rate has doubled in the last five years but the number of police has remained the same.Many crimes are alcohol related such as woundings and assaults.Car theft is a major problem.Juvenile crime is increasing,minor damage and burglary being the main offences. Police hope that local people will set up a community watch group to help protect individuals and property.They fear that drug abuse and glue sniffing are on the increase.
